help_configuration_file.en: The config params are stored at the config file: module_attributequeryconsumer.php that is located at the simpleSAMLphp's config directory, default directory is 'config'

help_auth.en: Authentication source that protect the Manager. ex 'admin'

help_sp_source.en: SAML autentication source used to send the Attribute Query. The authenication source must be defined, default file to define it is the authsources.php file that must be located at the simpleSAMLphp's config directory

help_aqs_url.en: URL of the Attribute Query Server

help_test_aqs_url.en: URL for the testing of the Attribute Query Server

help_allowed_admins.en: Array of allowed admins. The value of the user ID field must match any value of the list to get permission in order to execute an attribute query

exampletest_desc.en: This is a test page for sending an AttributeQuery message.

help_attributelist.en: Attribute List (optional, Leave blank to request all. Format example: uid, mail, cn)

undefined_test_url.en: Undefined, set it at configure file or change to Complex Query view
